start.text: You are an adventurer searching for the Lost Temple of Zara. After a long journey, you find yourself at a crossroads. One path leads into a dark cave, the other into a dense jungle.

cave.text: The cave is dark and damp. You hear strange noises echoing from the depths. You can either light a torch or proceed in darkness.

jungle.text: The jungle is teeming with life. You see a path that seems to be man-made. You can either follow the path or try to cut your own way through the thick undergrowth.

torch.text: You light a torch and the cave is illuminated. You see that the noises were just bats. You have found the Lost Temple of Zara!

darkness.text: You stumble in the darkness and fall into a pit. Your adventure ends here.

path.text: You follow the path and it leads you directly to the Lost Temple of Zara!

undergrowth.text: You get lost in the jungle and are never seen again.
